identity.name: Career Plus
identity.vibe: Cyber-Professional, Gen-Z, Dark Mode First, AI-Centric

usage.h1: font-unbounded font-bold text-5xl md:text-7xl tracking-tight leading-none
usage.small: font-jakarta text-sm font-medium tracking-wide uppercase text-muted-foreground/80
usage.code: font-mono text-xs bg-secondary/50 px-1 py-0.5 rounded

buttons.primary: bg-primary hover:bg-primary/90 text-white font-medium px-8 py-3 rounded-full transition-all duration-300 hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_-5px_rgba(124,58,237,0.5)] active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary hover:bg-secondary/80 text-white font-medium px-8 py-3 rounded-full border border-white/10 transition-all duration-300
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-white/5 text-muted-foreground hover:text-white px-6 py-2 rounded-full transition-colors

cards.base: relative overflow-hidden rounded-2xl border border-white/10 bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-xl p-8 transition-all duration-300 hover:border-white/20 hover:shadow-2xl group

inputs.base: bg-white/5 border-white/10 focus:border-primary/50 focus:ring-primary/20 rounded-xl h-12 px-4 text-white placeholder:text-white/20 transition-all

instructions_to_main_agent: CRITICAL: Implement the 'Unbounded' font for all headings. This is the core of the Gen-Z aesthetic.
CRITICAL: The theme is DARK MODE ONLY. Do not implement a light mode toggle unless explicitly asked. Force dark mode classes.
CRITICAL: The AI Chat Interface is the 'Hero'. It should not be a small widget. It should be central, large, and inviting.
Use 'glassmorphism' heavily for cards to create depth against the dark background.
Use the 'accent' color (#ccf381) sparingly for high-value actions (e.g., 'Accept Gig', 'Payment Received').
Ensure all interactive elements have the 'data-testid' attribute.
Do not use generic 'lorem ipsum'. Use realistic copy related to student gigs (e.g., 'Fix my React bug', 'Design a logo for my startup').
For the Dashboard, use the 'Control Room' grid strategy: dense, data-rich, but visually organized.
Animations: Use 'framer-motion' for smooth entrance effects. Stagger children in lists.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI slop' designs (generic centered layouts, standard Bootstrap look).
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical. 'p-8' is the minimum for content containers.
Never use pure black (#000000) for backgrounds unless it's for contrast against a dark grey. Use #050505.
Always add hover states that lift the element or glow.
